did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: The C.B. Anderson Account Book contains the accounting information and merchandise sales of C.B. Anderson of Newbern, Virginia. Entries date from 1907 through 1909.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from C.B. Anderson Account Book must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the C.B. Anderson Account Book was completed in September 2011.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: C.B. Anderson Account Book contains the accounting information for "C.B. Anderson, The Cash Merchant" of Newbern, VA. Entries date from 1907 through 1909 and include names and listings of goods and prices.

There is a note on the inside cover which reads: "This book was originally used by [Newbern] M.&M. Co. ... store at Welch, W. Va as a cash book ... January 3rd 1906 - Page 1 to 38 [Anderson] cut out and filed with other books used at Welch." - May 11, 1907 Pages 1 through 38 are missing and it is believed that C.B. Anderson took over use of the book at this time.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Collection is arranged by material type.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Additional records from this business can be found in the C.B. Anderson records, Ms1989-083
